org.apache.flink.runtime.state.heap

类 AbstractHeapMergingState<K,N,IN,OUT,SV,S extends State,SD extends StateDescriptor<S,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.heap.AbstractHeapState<K,N,SV,S,SD>
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.heap.AbstractHeapMergingState<K,N,IN,OUT,SV,S,SD>
  • 类型参数:
    K - The type of the key.
    N - The type of the namespace.
    SV - The type of the values in the state.
    S - The type of State
    SD - The type of StateDescriptor for the State S
    所有已实现的接口:
    AppendingState<IN,OUT>, MergingState<IN,OUT>, State, InternalAppendingState<N,IN,OUT>, InternalKvState<N>, InternalMergingState<N,IN,OUT>
    直接已知子类:
    HeapAggregatingState, HeapListState, HeapReducingState

    public abstract class AbstractHeapMergingState<K,N,IN,OUT,SV,S extends State,SD extends StateDescriptor<S,?>>
extends AbstractHeapState<K,N,SV,S,SD>
implements InternalMergingState<N,IN,OUT>
    Base class for MergingState (InternalMergingState) that is stored on the heap.

      • AbstractHeapMergingState

        protected AbstractHeapMergingState(SD stateDesc,
                                   StateTable<K,N,SV> stateTable,
                                   TypeSerializer<K> keySerializer,
                                   TypeSerializer<N> namespaceSerializer)
        Creates a new key/value state for the given hash map of key/value pairs.
        参数:
        stateDesc - The state identifier for the state. This contains name and can create a default state value.
        stateTable - The state tab;e to use in this kev/value state. May contain initial state.

    • 方法详细资料

      • mergeNamespaces

        public void mergeNamespaces(N target,
                            java.util.Collection<N> sources)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: InternalMergingState
        Merges the state of the current key for the given source namespaces into the state of the target namespace.
        指定者:
        mergeNamespaces 在接口中 InternalMergingState<N,IN,OUT>
        参数:
        target - The target namespace where the merged state should be stored.
        sources - The source namespaces whose state should be merged.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - The method may forward exception thrown internally (by I/O or functions).

                                 SV b)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
